# FILES::GET_DLC_WEAPON_DATA

## Summary
Looks up a weapon based on the supplied dlc index (dlcIndex must be inside range: (0 <= dlcIndex < GET_NUM_DLC_WEAPONS()) )

## Parameters
* **INT** dlc
* **scrShopWeaponData\*** weapon

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
dlcWeaponIndex takes a number from 0 - GET_NUM_DLC_WEAPONS() - 1.
struct DlcWeaponData
{
int emptyCheck; //use DLC1::IS_CONTENT_ITEM_LOCKED on this
int padding1;
int weaponHash;
int padding2;
int unk;
int padding3;
int weaponCost;
int padding4;
int ammoCost;
int padding5;
int ammoType;
int padding6;
int defaultClipSize;
int padding7;
char nameLabel[64];
char descLabel[64];
char desc2Label[64]; // usually "the" + name
char upperCaseNameLabel[64];
};
